Posts.Content: I am from the uterine cancer forum. Many of us went into abrupt menopause from same surgery. Maybe you could read our board and get some good suggestions. Venaflexin or Effexor 37.5 mg is an antidepressant that as an “off label use” has been proven in the clinical literature to help resolve hot flashes. I took it for about 6 yrs with good relief.Â  Lori
Posts.Title: Has anyone else been through surgical menopause?
